name: Alchemical INC Demo
description:
Alchemical INC. Demo Support us on Kickstarter! Summary

Alchemical INC. takes a tactical card battler and wraps the experience in a lush, first person adventure. Explore New Folk City, a bustling steampunk inspired metropolis. Home to the Alchemical INC. factory, the surrounding neighborhood is flooded with Alchemy cards, corruption, pollution, and debauchery.

Features
  • Strategic auto-battling
  • First person exploration
  • Build decks with 250+ cards
  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Roguelite play sessions 
  • Tons of unique characters to hustle

Controls: Mouse & Keyboard

Early access is planned for Q1 2023.

Wishlist on Steam Join us on Discord
